original_text: And when I was present with you, and wanted, I was chargeable to no man: for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied: and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you, and so will I keep myself.
korean_text: 또 내가 너희와 함께 있을 때 비용이 부족하였으되 아무에게도 누를 끼치지 아니하였음은 마게도냐에서 온 형제들이 나의 부족한 것을 보충하였음이라 내가 모든 일에 너희에게 폐를 끼치지 않기 위하여 스스로 조심하였고 또 조심하리라

sentences.original_text: And when I was present with you
I was chargeable to no man
for that which was lacking to me
the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied
I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 부담이 되지 않도록 스스로를 지켜왔고

sentences.original_text: and so will I keep myself
